title: Birthday Blues
description: Elena is excited for her upcoming birthday, but worries her family will forget it--and her--after the recent birth of her baby sister. In Birthday Blues, Elena's older sister, Nina, helps her work through her feelings and realize how fun having a younger sister will be--just in time for a birthday surprise. This book can also be used to help students connect to prior knowledge and analyze characters.
meta: attention, congratulations, distracted, frustration, muttered, point
Consonant Digraphs : Identify and use consonant digraph th
Exclamation Marks : Recognize and use exclamation marks
Compound Words : Recognize and use compound words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
